Text: Hey Mlody.. thx for uploading all these soundtracks. but i was wondering if u got the soundtrack for smallville season 6??

absolutely amazing uploads.  Greatly enjoyed the music from all of these five seasons you've provided.  As the previous commentator mentioned Season 6 & 7 would be equally appreciated.  Also, just as a recommendation,  a naming format that identified them by episode under grouping and labels them all as Smallville - Season 5 under album makes them much easier to import into something like iTunes.
Great uploads. Thanks mlody00843. Will seed for couple of weeks when I'm OL.
